name: ominous-wind
effect: Inflicts regular damage. Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats one stage.
short_effect: Has a 10% chance to raise all of the user’s stats by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user blasts the target with a gust of repulsive wind. This may also raise all the user’s stats at once.
